summary: This is just a simple mod that adds a new weapon called Bloodbane into the game.
descriptionHtml:
Bloodbane is a retextured Glass Greatsword with a Red blade, the weapon can be found on the weapon plaque in Broken oar Grotto. Bloodbane is 3 points stronger then the regular glass greatsword (well, at least in CK)

Please try out this mod and let me know what you think, thank you
author: Unleashed214

files.name: Bloodbane
files.changelogHtml:
The curse of Bloodbane was added, this is an absorb health enchantment with 1000 uses
Both weapons now have a backstory in their descriptions, feel free to make up your own storys, who knows? it just might be an addition
